head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MARTEN, DOROTHY M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MARTEN, DOROTHY M.

block.p: MARTEN-Dorothy M. July 25, 2000 of Somers, New York. Wife of the late Norman T. Marten, Sr. Sister of Edna Scoppa. Mother of Norman T. Marten, Jr., and Penelope W. York. Grandmother of four. Memorial service at Saint Luke's Episcopal Church, Somers, NY, Friday 5PM. Interment Saint Luke's Memorial Garden. In lieu of flowers contributions may be made to The Saint Luke's Episcopal Church Memorial Garden Fund or The Salvation Army.
